name: Vodka
description: Vodka is a distilled beverage composed primarily of water and ethanol, sometimes with traces of impurities and flavorings.

name: Whisky
description: Whisky or whiskey is a type of distilled alcoholic beverage made from fermented grain mash.

name: Beer
description: Beer is one of the oldest and most widely consumed alcoholic drinks in the world, and the third most popular drink overall after water and tea.

name: Wine
description: Wine is an alcoholic beverage made from fermented grapes.
